titleStmt.title: The model of Presbytery· Wherein the supreme power resides in the high and mighty annual assembly, which is composed of two preaching elders or ministers, and one lay-elder out of every Presbytery; one commissioner from every corporation, university and colledge; ...

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for Jonathan Edwin, at the Three Roses in Ludgate-Street,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the British Library.
